001package gbw.melange.events.observability;
002
003import gbw.melange.common.events.observability.IFallibleBiConsumer;
004import gbw.melange.common.events.observability.IFallibleBlockingObservable;
005import gbw.melange.common.events.observability.filters.IFallibleFilterChain;
006import gbw.melange.common.events.observability.filters.IFilterChain;
007import gbw.melange.events.observability.filters.FilterChain;
008
009import java.util.Collection;
010
011/**
012 * <p>FallibleBlockingObservable class.</p>
013 *
014 * @author GustavBW
015 * @version $Id: $Id
016 */
017public class FallibleBlockingObservable<T> extends ObservableValue<T, IFallibleBiConsumer<T>>
018        implements IFallibleBlockingObservable<T> {
019    private final IFallibleFilterChain<T, Integer> filters = FilterChain.fallible();
020
021    private final Object lock = new Object();
022    FallibleBlockingObservable(T initialValue){
023        super(initialValue);
024    }
025    /** {@inheritDoc} */
026    @Override
027    public T get(){
028        synchronized (lock){
029            return super.get();
030        }
031    }
032    /** {@inheritDoc} */
033    @Override
034    public void set(T newer) throws Exception {
035        if(newer == null) return;
036        synchronized (lock) {
037            final T current = get();
038            if(current == null || !super.equalityFunction.test(current, newer)){
039                filters.run(current, newer);
040            }
041            super.setRaw(newer);
042        }
043    }
044    /** {@inheritDoc} */
045    @Override
046    public Collection<Exception> setAllowExceptions(T newer) {
047        synchronized (lock) {
048            final T current = get();
049            return filters.runAllowExceptions(current, newer);
050        }
051    }
052    /** {@inheritDoc} */
053    @Override
054    public IFilterChain<IFallibleBiConsumer<T>, Integer> onChange() {
055        return filters;
056    }
057}
